tool.name: Convert from BAM to FastQ

param.name: input
param.label: Convert the following BAM file to FASTQ

param.name: tags
param.label: Create FASTQ based on the mate info in the BAM R2 and Q2 tags.

param.name: fq2
param.label: FASTQ for second end. Used if BAM contains paired-end data. BAM should be sorted by query name if creating paired FASTQ with this option.
